Name: Cracking the AP Physics C Exam, 2014 Edition (College Test Preparation)

ReviewList.Text: awesome and clear explanation of concepts with detailed answer explanations to exercise questions. I used this book when I started preparing just two months before AP mechanics and electromagnetism exams and scored 4 and 4.

I used it for 1 month before AP Physics C: Mechanics test to self study and I earned a 5! (I took AP Physics B at school). Easy to read, great problems with explanations and overall very high quality. I definitely recommend it to anyone planning on taking the AP Physics C tests.

True Headline "If its in the test then its in the book" I 100% agree to it. This book is articulate in its writing with great concept explanation through diagrams. Though the book is concised in some parts but its compliancy for Indian students especially is corroborate success !! No significant mistake I noticed in my reading through book.
It is really thorough and has lot of hints for the AP test. The shipment arrived in a day which is really good.

If you are taking C, I strongly suggest picking this up. Mechanics was pretty easy but E&M; could be a struggle at times. Thankfully, this book seems to focus mostly on E&M; and makes daunting concepts easy to understand. In conjunction with Viren's AP Physics review videos (google him, it can be monumentally helpful), Physics C could even be approached as a self study (I did it, so can you).

Whatever the merits of this publication, it has NOT been adapted to the Kindle format. I have to buy the hard copy now. Not happy at having to spend the money again. Wish Amazon had a refund procedure for returning Kindle books and buying the hard copy in its place!
The girls say it's a great book so far. We'll see how the exams go.
My son got 5/5 on his exam so I will give some credit to this book.
Our son is using this book in conjunction with his textbook for his AP Physics class to "review as his goes through the class".  It arrived on time and is a great price compared to local bookstores.
